LanguageData.NSalvageRobotCorpse.stages.0.label: i salvaged a robot
LanguageData.NSalvageRobotCorpse.stages.0.description: I repurposed mechanical materials for the colony.
LanguageData.NKnowSalvageRobotCorpse.stages.0.label: you shouldn't see this
LanguageData.NKnowSalvageRobotCorpse.stages.0.descrip: I don't know how you found this.
